original_text: His servants therefore took him out of that chariot, and put him in the second chariot that he had; and they brought him to Jerusalem, and he died, and was buried in one of the sepulchres of his fathers. And all Judah and Jerusalem mourned for Josiah.
korean_text: 그 부하들이 그를 병거에서 내리게 하고 그의 버금 병거에 태워 예루살렘에 이른 후에 그가 죽으니 그의 조상들의 묘실에 장사되니라 온 유다와 예루살렘 사람들이 요시야를 슬퍼하고

sentences.original_text: His servants therefore took him out of that chariot
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 종들이 그러므로 그를 그 전차에서 내려오게 했고

sentences.original_text: and put him in the second chariot that he had
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 가진 두 번째 전차에 그를 태웠으며

sentences.original_text: and they brought him to Jerusalem
and was buried in one of the sepulchres of his fathers
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 조상들의 무덤 중 하나에 장사되었으며

sentences.original_text: And all Judah and Jerusalem mourned for Josiah
sentences.korean_translation: 유다와 예루살렘 모두가 요시야를 위해 애곡했다
